input_text:
Job Title: Server - Beach House

Location: Delray Beach, Florida, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Intimately nestled on Florida’s Emerald Coast, set among striking Caribbean blue waters and lush nature preserves along 30A, Kaiya welcomes a refined and diverse set of residents and vacationers who seek culturally rich experiences and value creativity as a vital part of their lives. Here a residential community featuring beautifully designed villas, townhomes, and condominiums offer access to wholistic wellness practices, cultural amenities, and resort-level service tailored to any need. Kaiya unlocks the opportunity to practice a life-enhancing lifestyle grounded in the pursuit of meaningful moments.

Kaiya is focused on bringing harmony to life through enhancing everyday connection with the self, others and the beauty around us. The private Kaiya Beach House, Omaire Gallery, Thisday Cafe and more are all designed for cultural abundance and natural connection. Programming will bring together those who seek refined and culturally rich experiences. This is Kaiya - Life in Harmony.

We are looking for out-going, enthusiastic individuals with an eye for detail to join our opening team at the Kaiya Beach House. Service team members will provide light food & beverage service in our 1st and 2nd floor lounge areas as well as by our pool with stunning Gulf Coast views. You will be interacting daily with our discerning owners, club members and vacation renters and their families who are in search of the best service experience while being able to relax and enjoy the peace and serenity of Kaiya and the surrounding area.

Responsibilities

 Demonstrate knowledge of complimentary food & beverage offerings while maintaining cleanliness of bar and food service areas.  Guiding guests through all phases of their experience at Kaiya Beach House and exhibiting understanding of the resort amenities and local area.  Cleaning of all equipment, tools, and supplies and maintaining equipment in good working order while following all procedures and policies set forth by the company, division, department, and County health department.  Working as a team and effectively communicating with management, guest services and other team members to fulfill and address any issues or needs requested by owners, members, guests and or other Associates.  Always being thoughtful, showing enthusiasm, being humble, being thankful, and being respectful to all team members, owners, members, and guests.  Flexible schedule – available to work morning, afternoon and evenings, weekdays and weekends as well as holidays.  Perform other tasks or projects as assigned by management. 

Qualifications

 Must possess positive attitude and desire to deliver exceptional guest service at all times  Excellent customer service skills and a knowledge of Spirits, Wine and Food are preferred  Ability to speak, read and write in English proficiently  Professional, neat and tidy personal appearance  This position is available to individuals 18 years or older as service of alcoholic beverages will be required  High School or equivalent education preferred 

What We Offer:

 An opportunity to work at the newest luxury community at the heart of the Emerald Coast 5-star training and opportunities for career advancement within the property and the company A culture of respect, where we hold each other accountable and encourage each other to be our best Discounted room rates at our partner properties Custom uniforms Full-time employees have access to a competitive benefits package including medical, dental, 401k & PTO. 

Physical Requirements:

Must be able to stand and exert well-paced mobility for up to 6 hours in length. Must be able to exert well-paced ability to maneuver between functions occurring simultaneously. Must be able to lift up to 15-40 lbs. on a regular and continuing basis. Must be able to walk, stand, sit, bend, stoop, squat and stretch to fulfill tasks. Must have finger dexterity to be able to operate office equipment.

Join us in creating unforgettable experiences for our guests, building vibrant communities, and shaping the future of travel and hospitality.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Server - Beach House
output_json.summary: Join Kaiya, a luxurious residential community in Delray Beach, Florida, offering a life-enhancing lifestyle.
